edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.model.db
Class RegisteredAppDbAdapter

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.model.db.DbAdapter
      edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.model.db.RegisteredAppDbAdapter

public class RegisteredAppDbAdapter
extends DbAdapter

Database helper class for the RegisteredApps table. Defines basic CRUD methods.

This table contains all applications registered in Omnidroid. For each application record: AppName is name of the application; PkgName is the package name of the application; Enabled is whether this application is enabled in Omnidroid

Note: Every app should have a unique name

public Cursor fetchAll(java.lang.String appName,
                       java.lang.String pkgName,
                       java.lang.Boolean enabled)
Return a Cursor that contains all RegisteredApp records which matches the parameters.

Parameters:
appName - is the application name or null to fetch any appName.
pkgName - is the package name or null to fetch any pkgName.
enabled - is whether the application is activated or null to fetch any enabled status.
Returns:
a Cursor that contains all RegisteredApp records which matches the parameters.

Throws:
